Centre for Research on Engineering Software Technologies

Helping industries, governments, and societies to build human- as well as technological-based competencies in software systems engineering

Previous Next

Research Areas

We develop and/or rigorously evaluate methods, processes, approaches, and tools for designing, analyzing, and evolving dependable software-intensive systems and services that underpin business- and mission-critical processes in a wide variety of domains.

Software System and Services

Developing and/or rigorously evaluating methods, approaches, and tools for supporting the design, analysis, and evolution of complex and dependable software-intensive system and services that meet both the functional and non-functional requirements.

Security and Privacy

Building knowledge, processes, methods, and tools for engineering secure and privacy-preserving software-intensive systems and services. Some current projects: automated data exfiltration detection and prevention, middleware for managing data location, security and privacy.

Social Computing

Leveraging social computing paradigm and technologies for innovation and productivity for sustainable societies.
